thread.section_title: PRTG Network Monitor Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von PRTG Network Monitor | paessler.com
thread.title: Alexander Fabech
thread.title_full: PRTG Network Monitor bewertet von Alexander Fabech

author: Alexander Fabech
title: Alexander Fabech
text:
We use PRTG in our company for monitoring about 40 customers with about 5000 sensors running on our PRTG installation.
We are very happy with this tool, for finding errors, provide downtime to suppliers/customers, harddrive space, and so on.
